channel.title: [PI] How do you make an NPC telport you[PI]
channel.description:
Like Pirate jackie teleports you somewere... title says it all.
how can i make a npc teleport a play to my pk box if clicked on

item.title: [PI] How do you make an NPC telport you[PI]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Class: ActionHandler;
Method: firstClickNPC();
Statement: switch(npcType);

case NPC_ID:
    c.getPA().movePlayer(XXXX, YYYY, HHHH);
break;
